dynamic-analysis-projects.name: veracode-da-reset-scheduler
dynamic-analysis-projects.description: Resets all recurrent scheduled analysis jobs configured for one year that have expired.

dynamic-analysis-projects.name: Veracode Dynamic Analysis Examples
dynamic-analysis-projects.description: Dynamic Analysis API Examples.  Currently includes example code for using the Scanner Variables feature, where credentials can be defined and updated at the account level, and referenced in Selenium login scripts.

dynamic-analysis-projects.name: Veracode DAST Add bulk urls to blocklist
dynamic-analysis-projects.description: Adds a list of urls to the blocklist for an existing DAST scan.
